org.graalvm.polyglot

Class HostAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.graalvm.polyglot.HostAccess

  • public final class HostAccess
extends Object
    Configuration of host access. There are two predefined instances of host access HostAccess.EXPLICIT and HostAccess.PUBLIC which one can use when building a context Context.Builder.allowHostAccess(org.graalvm.polyglot.HostAccess). Should the predefined instances not be enough, one can create own configuration with HostAccess.newBuilder().
    Since:
    1.0 RC14

      Builder to create own HostAccess.

      Annotation to export public methods or fields.
